statements: SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT recommendation_text, organization_name, country FROM recommendations WHERE compliance_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT organization_name, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE compliance_level < 3;
SELECT recommendation_id, organization_name, country, compliance_level FROM recommendations WHERE organization_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE compliance_level > 5 ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC
SELECT recommendation_text, organization_name FROM recommendations WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY organization_name
SELECT recommendation_id, organization_name FROM recommendations WHERE country='Germany' AND compliance_level < 5
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE compliance_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY organization_name DESC, country
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE organization_name='Company A' OR organization_name='Company B'
SELECT * FROM Recommendations;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE implementation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text, implementation_status FROM Recommendations ORDER BY implementation_status ASC, recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations WHERE implementation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recommendations JOIN ComplianceLevels ON Recommendations.recommendation_id = ComplianceLevels.level_id;
SELECT COUNT(recommendation_id) AS total_recommendations FROM Recommendations;
SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT recommendation FROM recommendations WHERE compliance_level >= 3;
SELECT body_name, body_id FROM bodies ORDER BY body_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM assessments WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT r.recommendation, a.assessment_date FROM assessments a JOIN recommendations r ON a.recommendation_id = r.id ORDER BY a.assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE compliance_level > 2;
SELECT recommendation, compliance_level FROM recommendations ORDER BY compliance_level DESC;
SELECT b.body_name, a.assessment_date FROM bodies b INNER JOIN assessments a ON b.body_id = a.body_id;
SELECT r.recommendation, a.assessment_date FROM recommendations r INNER JOIN assessments a ON r.id = a.recommendation_id;
SELECT r.recommendation, b.body_name FROM recommendations r INNER JOIN assessments a ON r.id = a.recommendation_id INNER JOIN bodies b ON a.body_id = b.body_id;
SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE implementation_status='Pending';
SELECT country_name FROM countries ORDER BY country_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_bodies WHERE body_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT level_description, compliance_status FROM compliance_levels WHERE level_id > 2 ORDER BY level_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT country_name, country_id FROM countries WHERE country_id < 10 ORDER BY country_name ASC;
SELECT body_name, body_id FROM human_rights_bodies WHERE body_id > 5 ORDER BY body_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_levels WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY level_id ASC;
SELECT recommendation_text, implementation_status FROM recommendations WHERE implementation_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM recommendations;
SELECT recommendation_text, implementation_status FROM recommendations;
SELECT id, recommendation_text, compliance_level FROM recommendations;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_bodies WHERE country='USA';
SELECT body_name, mandate FROM human_rights_bodies;
SELECT id, recommendation_text, implementation_status, compliance_level FROM recommendations WHERE implementation_status='In Progress';
SELECT * FROM human_rights_bodies WHERE country='Canada' ORDER BY body_name ASC;
SELECT id, report_title, assessment_date FROM assessment_reports WHERE compliance_rating='High' LIMIT 10;

SELECT recommendations.recommendation_text, assessment_reports.report_title FROM recommendations JOIN recommendations_mapping ON recommendations.id = recommendations_mapping.recommendation_id JOIN assessment_reports ON assessment_reports.id = recommendations_mapping.assessment_report_id;
SELECT * FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_type='Government' OR stakeholder_type='NGO' ORDER BY stakeholder_name DESC;
